statements: SELECT * FROM transaction_records ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, user_id, amount FROM transaction_records WHERE user_id = 100;
SELECT AVG(amount) FROM transaction_records WHERE transaction_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT description, transaction_date FROM transaction_records WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date ASC;
SELECT MAX(amount) AS max_amount, MIN(amount) AS min_amount FROM transaction_records;
SELECT * FROM transaction_records WHERE amount > 100 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT user_id, SUM(amount) FROM transaction_records GROUP BY user_id HAVING SUM(amount) > 500
SELECT user_id, MAX(transaction_date) FROM transaction_records GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY MAX(transaction_date) ASC
SELECT description, AVG(amount) AS avg_amount FROM transaction_records WHERE user_id = 123 GROUP BY description
SELECT COUNT(transaction_id) AS total_transactions FROM transaction_records
SELECT * FROM transactions;
SELECT transaction_id, amount FROM transactions WHERE transaction_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT description FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, description FROM transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, action FROM audit_logs WHERE log_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT transaction_date, amount, description FROM transactions WHERE transaction_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, amount FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_id ASC;
SELECT transaction_id, description FROM transactions WHERE description LIKE '%payment%' OR description LIKE '%purchase%';
SELECT log_date, user_id, action FROM audit_logs WHERE log_id > 100 ORDER BY log_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM transactions;
SELECT account_id, transaction_amount FROM transactions ORDER BY transaction_amount DESC;
SELECT transaction_date, transaction_amount FROM transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 100;
SELECT account_name, account_balance FROM accounts ORDER BY account_balance ASC;
SELECT transaction_id, timestamp, action FROM audit_trail WHERE user_id = 100;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT account_id, account_name, account_type FROM accounts WHERE account_balance < 0;
SELECT transaction_id, account_id, transaction_amount, transaction_date FROM transactions WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-06-30';
SELECT * FROM audit_trail WHERE action = 'DELETE' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT account_id, SUM(transaction_amount) AS total_transactions FROM transactions GROUP BY account_id HAVING total_transactions > 5000;
SELECT * FROM transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT account_id, amount FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT account_name, account_type FROM accounts WHERE account_balance < 0 ORDER BY account_balance ASC;
SELECT user_id, username, role FROM users WHERE role = 'admin';
SELECT * FROM audit_logs WHERE log_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT transaction_id, amount FROM transactions WHERE account_id = 100 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM accounts WHERE account_balance > 10000 AND account_type = 'Savings' ORDER BY account_name ASC;

SELECT transaction_id, transaction_date, amount FROM transactions JOIN accounts ON transactions.account_id = accounts.account_id WHERE accounts.account_type = 'Checking' AND transaction_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT u.username, a.account_name, t.amount FROM users u INNER JOIN accounts a ON u.user_id = a.account_id INNER JOIN transactions t ON a.account_id = t.account_id WHERE u.role = 'Admin';

SELECT a.account_id, a.account_name, t.amount, t.transaction_date FROM accounts a LEFT JOIN transactions t ON a.account_id = t.account_id WHERE t.amount IS NULL AND a.account_balance > 0 ORDER BY a.account_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, description FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT user_id, email FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT account_name, balance FROM accounts WHERE balance < 0;
SELECT * FROM transactions_history WHERE action = 'refund' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM transactions;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, transaction_date FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT description, amount FROM transactions WHERE transaction_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT action, timestamp FROM transactions_history INNER JOIN audit_log ON transactions_history.transaction_id = audit_log.user_id ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
